newsitem.title: DENMARK: Danish futop turnover rises 10 pct in February.
newsitem.headline: Danish futop turnover rises 10 pct in February.

text.p: Futures and options turnover on Denmark's Futop exchange rose 10 percent in February to an average 3,232 contracts per day, the exchange said on Thursday.
It said the total turnover for February 1997 was 64,648 contracts compared to January's 64,890.
At the same time trade in Danish state bonds rose 14 percent to 1,177 contracts per day, with total bond-based contracts 16 percent up at 1,291, it said.
Equity-based contracts rose six percent to a daily 1,941 or 38,829 contracts for the whole month of February.
